attributes.action: make it compulsory for all children to carry out a certain number of hours dedicated to voluntary work
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: If children were made to take an interest in their own environment, in their own time, I believe they would show it more respect.  Compulsory voluntary work in a choice of sectors, such as working with the elderly, litter picking, grafitti cleaning etc would not only save the taxpayer millions, but promote a positive attitude in our young people regarding their community and those who live in it.
